channel.title: Posts - VG Homepage
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on VG Homepage

item.title: Delft After Rain
item.description: It was so beautiful the city of Delft after a rain in a nice summer afternoon. I attached some pictures taken on the way to the city centre.

item.title: The PhD Thesis Latex Template for PhD students from TRAIL Research School, The Netherlands
item.description: The latex format is checked and confirmed by Trail, together with online demo and detail instructions. If you are the PhD student struggling with the Latex for your Thesis, this is exactly what you need.

item.title: First_post
item.description: 111 Lorem markdownum eram. Factum ut invidiae utrumque non aves ab quoque coepta nisi causa haurit aure, anxius. In ultima accedere Apollineae aequalis silvi studiisque rite, ubi concolor argumentum dignus. Illa lacrimosa scilicet rursus.

item.title: Detecting Objects on Multiple Images using You Only Look Once (Yolo)
item.description: Object detection is a common machine learning task. One of the widely used object detection tool is *You Only Look Once (Yolo)*, which is implemented based on the Darknet, an Open Source Neural Networks in C. In this project, I improved the YOLO by adding several convenient functions for detecting objects for research and the development community.

item.title: Invitation to My PhD Defence
item.description: You are cordially invited to the public online defence of my PhD dissertation, which will be held on Monday, Sep 21st, 2020 at 14:30 Amsterdam time (CET). The dissertation is entitled: Using Social Media to Characterise Crowds in City Events for Crowd Management.
